ABOUT DARIO GALANTE

My name is Dario Galante and Iâ€™m a professional technical translator in Israel, Italian native speaker since 2002.

My studies include Business management, and at later stage, computer courses getting a CompTIA A+ degree, and studying the use of the regular Office program + Internet and Google Ads.

My past experience as translator gave me the opportunity to accomplish projects for customers in Israel like HP Indigo, Press-sense, CREO , and many more, becoming an expert in the prepress and industrial printer field.

In the mean time I translated from Israel for many several other high tech companies, broadening my experience that now includes the following fields:

Press equipment and software Telecommunications Information security Web based applications Mobile Phones Video and audio devices Survillance, Control and Security systems Electro optics Medical devices Gaming

CONTACT ME NOW!
